explains: n. 证明，资质证书；出具课程结业证书
wordGroup: quality certification system 质量保证制度
certification mark 证明商标；商品标志
china compulsory certification 中国强制认证（3C认证）

sentences.en: An employer can demand written certification that the relative is really ill.
sentences.cn: 雇主可要求书面证明以证实这位亲属确实病了。

sentences.en: It could have meant the end as far as the certification process was concerned.
sentences.cn: 就认证过程而言，这可能意味着结束。

sentences.en: Some states require parents or a home tutor to meet teacher certification standards.
sentences.cn: 一些州要求家长或家庭教师达到教师资格认证标准。
